post.author: 임정숙
post.content:
Information is from www.multimediator.com (job posting section)
Posted (01/02/2003)

Ce Tech


We currently looking for a Web Developer: Candidate must have strong Web development experience: HTML, Perl, Java script, C++, Sybase other requirements: •Excellent English oral and written communication skills •Ambitious and driven individual - serious about his/her quality of work •Dynamic and outgoing personality - To be considered for this position, please submit resume and URL’s to jon@ce.com
post.title: Looking for Web Developer (Toronto)
